channel.title: Need help-please!
channel.description:
Hi.
I have a Source and Client,I can edit the Java files,But the Class one's if I edit the Server won't let me login. I want to change things like Bank Name,Donate words for the command stuff like that. Please can someone help me?
Matt

item.title: Need help-please!
item.dc:creator: @Slickscape99 Slickscape99
item.description:
@Slickscape99 wrote:

I have like 5 Minutes before I have to go,But sure. 1 Sec.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help-please!
item.dc:creator: @Mariokillu Mariokillu
item.description:
@Mariokillu wrote:

Do you have teamviewer? I have nothing to do atm, I could fix it for you.

If you do, private message me your ID and pass for teamviewer.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help-please!
item.dc:creator: @Slickscape99 Slickscape99
item.description:
@Slickscape99 wrote:

Okay I deleted the old files and re-downloaded now I’m going to start fresh again. But if I edit texthandler.java it still doesn’t change bank name

Read full topic

item.title: Need help-please!
item.dc:creator: @Mariokillu Mariokillu
item.description:
@Mariokillu wrote:

[quote=“Slickscape99, post:8, topic:370775”]So basically open TextHandler.Class and delete everything in it,Then copy and paste Texthandler.Java in it,Then Compile?

Thanks,Matt[/quote]

No, replace the files them self. Both textHandler.class and textHandler.java with the original ones.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help-please!
item.dc:creator: @Mariokillu Mariokillu
item.description:
@Mariokillu wrote:

Slickscape99:

Yes,I have changed it in Texthandler.java in Source and it wouldn’t work so I messed around with Class Files and now I get a big error.

Well, if you still have the original Source files from when you downloaded the base, just replace the corrupt textHandler.class and .java with the original ones.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help-please!
item.dc:creator: @Slickscape99 Slickscape99
item.description:
@Slickscape99 wrote:

Yes,I have changed it in Texthandler.java in Source and it wouldn’t work so I messed around with Class Files and now I get a big error. I am using this source and client IDK what it is. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402032.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Need help-please!
item.dc:creator: @Mariokillu Mariokillu
item.description:
@Mariokillu wrote:

You don’t edit the .class files.

.class files are just the compiled version of the .java files.

If you are looking for how to change the bank name, that would be under textHandler.java. Just search for what the current bank name is, then just change that.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help-please!
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Slickscape99:

See thing is,I edit the Java files. But when I compile and login it’s still the same bank name? But if I search it up the class files has a different name in it,So I try to change then it won’t work.

If it’s a Delta server, the bank name is in textHandler.java.

Do you get any errors on compiling?

Read full topic
